00072 BMEditMesh *BMEdit_Create(BMesh *bm, int do_tessellate)
00073 {
00074     BMEditMesh *tm = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMEditMesh), __func__);
00075 
00076     tm->bm = bm;
00077     if (do_tessellate) {
00078         BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(tm);
00079     }
00080 
00081     return tm;
00082 }
00083 
00084 BMEditMesh *BMEdit_Copy(BMEditMesh *tm)
00085 {
00086     BMEditMesh *tm2 = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMEditMesh), __func__);
00087     *tm2 = *tm;
00088 
00089     tm2->derivedCage = tm2->derivedFinal = NULL;
00090 
00091     tm2->bm = BM_mesh_copy(tm->bm);
00092 
00093     /* The tessellation is NOT calculated on the copy here,
00094      * because currently all the callers of this function use
00095      * it to make a backup copy of the BMEditMesh to restore
00096      * it in the case of errors in an operation. For perf
00097      * reasons, in that case it makes more sense to do the
00098      * tessellation only when/if that copy ends up getting
00099      * used.*/
00100     tm2->looptris = NULL;
00101 
00102     tm2->vert_index = NULL;
00103     tm2->edge_index = NULL;
00104     tm2->face_index = NULL;
00105 
00106     return tm2;
00107 }
00108 
00109 static void BMEdit_RecalcTessellation_intern(BMEditMesh *tm)
00110 {
00111     /* use this to avoid locking pthread for _every_ polygon
00112      * and calling the fill function */
00113 #define USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
00114 
00115     BMesh *bm = tm->bm;
00116     BMLoop *(*looptris)[3]= NULL;
00117     BLI_array_declare(looptris);
00118     BMIter iter, liter;
00119     BMFace *f;
00120     BMLoop *l;
00121     int i = 0, j;
00122 
00123     ScanFillContext sf_ctx;
00124 
00125 #if 0
00126     /* note, we could be clever and re-use this array but would need to ensure
00127      * its realloced at some point, for now just free it */
00128     if (tm->looptris) MEM_freeN(tm->looptris);
00129 
00130     /* Use tm->tottri when set, this means no reallocs while transforming,
00131      * (unless scanfill fails), otherwise... */
00132     /* allocate the length of totfaces, avoid many small reallocs,
00133      * if all faces are tri's it will be correct, quads == 2x allocs */
00134     BLI_array_reserve(looptris, (tm->tottri && tm->tottri < bm->totface * 3) ? tm->tottri : bm->totface);
00135 #else
00136 
00137     /* this means no reallocs for quad dominant models, for */
00138     if ( (tm->looptris != NULL) &&
00139          (tm->tottri != 0) &&
00140          /* (totrti <= bm->totface * 2) would be fine for all quads,
00141           * but in case there are some ngons, still re-use the array */
00142          (tm->tottri <= bm->totface * 3))
00143     {
00144         looptris = tm->looptris;
00145     }
00146     else {
00147         if (tm->looptris) MEM_freeN(tm->looptris);
00148         BLI_array_reserve(looptris, bm->totface);
00149     }
00150 
00151 #endif
00152 
00153     f = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00154     for ( ; f; f=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00155         /*don't consider two-edged faces*/
00156         if (f->len < 3) {
00157             /* do nothing */
00158         }
00159 
00160 #ifdef USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
00161 
00162         /* no need to ensure the loop order, we know its ok */
00163 
00164         else if (f->len == 3) {
00165             BLI_array_growone(looptris);
00166             l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f);
00167             for (j=0; l; l=BM_iter_step(&liter), j++) {
00168                 looptris[i][j] = l;
00169             }
00170             i += 1;
00171         }
00172         else if (f->len == 4) {
00173             BMLoop *ltmp[4];
00174             BLI_array_growitems(looptris, 2);
00175 
00176             l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f);
00177             for (j=0; l; l=BM_iter_step(&liter), j++) {
00178                 ltmp[j] = l;
00179             }
00180 
00181             looptris[i][0] = ltmp[0];
00182             looptris[i][1] = ltmp[1];
00183             looptris[i][2] = ltmp[2];
00184             i += 1;
00185 
00186             looptris[i][0] = ltmp[0];
00187             looptris[i][1] = ltmp[2];
00188             looptris[i][2] = ltmp[3];
00189             i += 1;
00190         }
00191 
00192 #endif /* USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP */
00193 
00194         else {
00195             ScanFillVert *v, *lastv=NULL, *firstv=NULL;
00196             /* ScanFillEdge *e; */ /* UNUSED */
00197             ScanFillFace *efa;
00198             int totfilltri;
00199 
00200             BLI_begin_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00201             /*scanfill time*/
00202             l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f);
00203             for (j=0; l; l=BM_iter_step(&liter), j++) {
00204                 /*mark order*/
00205                 BM_elem_index_set(l, j); /* set_loop */
00206 
00207                 v = BLI_addfillvert(&sf_ctx, l->v->co);
00208                 v->tmp.p = l;
00209 
00210                 if (lastv) {
00211                     /* e = */ BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, lastv, v);
00212                 }
00213 
00214                 lastv = v;
00215                 if (firstv==NULL) firstv = v;
00216             }
00217 
00218             /*complete the loop*/
00219             BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, firstv, v);
00220 
00221             totfilltri = BLI_edgefill_ex(&sf_ctx, FALSE, f->no);
00222             BLI_array_growitems(looptris, totfilltri);
00223 
00224             for (efa = sf_ctx.fillfacebase.first; efa; efa=efa->next) {
00225                 BMLoop *l1= efa->v1->tmp.p;
00226                 BMLoop *l2= efa->v2->tmp.p;
00227                 BMLoop *l3= efa->v3->tmp.p;
00228 
00229                 if (BM_elem_index_get(l1) > BM_elem_index_get(l2)) { SWAP(BMLoop*, l1, l2); }
00230                 if (BM_elem_index_get(l2) > BM_elem_index_get(l3)) { SWAP(BMLoop*, l2, l3); }
00231                 if (BM_elem_index_get(l1) > BM_elem_index_get(l2)) { SWAP(BMLoop*, l1, l2); }
00232 
00233                 looptris[i][0] = l1;
00234                 looptris[i][1] = l2;
00235                 looptris[i][2] = l3;
00236                 i += 1;
00237             }
00238 
00239             BLI_end_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00240         }
00241     }
00242 
00243     tm->tottri = i;
00244     tm->looptris = looptris;
00245 
00246 #undef USE_TESSFACE_SPEEDUP
00247 
00248 }

00250 void BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(BMEditMesh *em)
00251 {
00252     BMEdit_RecalcTessellation_intern(em);
00253 
00254     /* commented because editbmesh_build_data() ensures we get tessfaces */
00255 #if 0
00256     if (em->derivedFinal && em->derivedFinal == em->derivedCage) {
00257         if (em->derivedFinal->recalcTessellation)
00258             em->derivedFinal->recalcTessellation(em->derivedFinal);
00259     }
00260     else if (em->derivedFinal) {
00261         if (em->derivedCage->recalcTessellation)
00262             em->derivedCage->recalcTessellation(em->derivedCage);
00263         if (em->derivedFinal->recalcTessellation)
00264             em->derivedFinal->recalcTessellation(em->derivedFinal);
00265     }
00266 #endif
00267 }

00269 void BMEdit_UpdateLinkedCustomData(BMEditMesh *em)
00270 {
00271     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00272     int act;
00273 
00274     if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY)) {
00275         act = CustomData_get_active_layer(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00276         CustomData_set_layer_active(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
00277 
00278         act = CustomData_get_render_layer(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00279         CustomData_set_layer_render(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
00280 
00281         act = CustomData_get_clone_layer(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00282         CustomData_set_layer_clone(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
00283 
00284         act = CustomData_get_stencil_layer(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00285         CustomData_set_layer_stencil(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, act);
00286     }
00287 }

00289 /*does not free the BMEditMesh struct itself*/
00290 void BMEdit_Free(BMEditMesh *em)
00291 {
00292     if (em->derivedFinal) {
00293         if (em->derivedFinal!=em->derivedCage) {
00294             em->derivedFinal->needsFree= 1;
00295             em->derivedFinal->release(em->derivedFinal);
00296         }
00297         em->derivedFinal= NULL;
00298     }
00299     if (em->derivedCage) {
00300         em->derivedCage->needsFree= 1;
00301         em->derivedCage->release(em->derivedCage);
00302         em->derivedCage= NULL;
00303     }
00304 
00305     if (em->looptris) MEM_freeN(em->looptris);
00306 
00307     if (em->vert_index) MEM_freeN(em->vert_index);
00308     if (em->edge_index) MEM_freeN(em->edge_index);
00309     if (em->face_index) MEM_freeN(em->face_index);
00310 
00311     if (em->bm)
00312         BM_mesh_free(em->bm);
00313 }
00314 
00315 /*
00316  * ok, basic design:
00317  *
00318  * the bmesh derivedmesh exposes the mesh as triangles.  it stores pointers
00319  * to three loops per triangle.  the derivedmesh stores a cache of tessellations
00320  * for each face.  this cache will smartly update as needed (though at first
00321  * it'll simply be more brute force).  keeping track of face/edge counts may
00322  * be a small problbm.
00323  *
00324  * this won't be the most efficient thing, considering that internal edges and
00325  * faces of tessellations are exposed.  looking up an edge by index in particular
00326  * is likely to be a little slow.
00327  */
00328 
00329 typedef struct EditDerivedBMesh {
00330     DerivedMesh dm;
00331 
00332     Object *ob;
00333     BMEditMesh *tc;
00334 
00335     float (*vertexCos)[3];
00336     float (*vertexNos)[3];
00337     float (*polyNos)[3];
00338 
00339     /* private variables, for number of verts/edges/faces
00340      * within the above hash/table members*/
00341     int tv, te, tf;
00342 } EditDerivedBMesh;

00355 static void emDM_foreachMappedVert(
00356         DerivedMesh *dm,
00357         void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float co[3], const float no_f[3], const short no_s[3]),
00358         void *userData)
00359 {
00360     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00361     BMVert *eve;
00362     BMIter iter;
00363     int i;
00364 
00365     eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
00366     for (i=0; eve; i++, eve=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00367         if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
00368             func(userData, i, bmdm->vertexCos[i], bmdm->vertexNos[i], NULL);
00369         }
00370         else {
00371             func(userData, i, eve->co, eve->no, NULL);
00372         }
00373     }
00374 }
00375 static void emDM_foreachMappedEdge(
00376         DerivedMesh *dm,
00377         void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float v0co[3], const float v1co[3]),
00378         void *userData)
00379 {
00380     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00381     BMEdge *eed;
00382     BMIter iter;
00383     int i;
00384 
00385     if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
00386 
00387         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERT);
00388 
00389         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00390         for (i=0; eed; i++,eed=BM_iter_step(&iter))
00391             func(userData, i,
00392                  bmdm->vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(eed->v1)],
00393                  bmdm->vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(eed->v2)]);
00394     }
00395     else {
00396         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00397         for (i=0; eed; i++,eed=BM_iter_step(&iter))
00398             func(userData, i, eed->v1->co, eed->v2->co);
00399     }
00400 }

00402 static void emDM_drawMappedEdges(
00403         DerivedMesh *dm,
00404         DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
00405         void *userData)
00406 {
00407     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00408     BMEdge *eed;
00409     BMIter iter;
00410     int i;
00411 
00412     if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
00413 
00414         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERT);
00415 
00416         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00417         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00418         for (i=0; eed; i++,eed=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00419             if (!setDrawOptions || (setDrawOptions(userData, i) != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP)) {
00420                 glVertex3fv(bmdm->vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(eed->v1)]);
00421                 glVertex3fv(bmdm->vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(eed->v2)]);
00422             }
00423         }
00424         glEnd();
00425     }
00426     else {
00427         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00428         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00429         for (i=0; eed; i++,eed=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00430             if (!setDrawOptions || (setDrawOptions(userData, i) != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP)) {
00431                 glVertex3fv(eed->v1->co);
00432                 glVertex3fv(eed->v2->co);
00433             }
00434         }
00435         glEnd();
00436     }
00437 }
00438 static void emDM_drawEdges(
00439         DerivedMesh *dm,
00440         int UNUSED(drawLooseEdges),
00441         int UNUSED(drawAllEdges))
00442 {
00443     emDM_drawMappedEdges(dm, NULL, NULL);

00446 static void emDM_drawMappedEdgesInterp(
00447         DerivedMesh *dm,
00448         DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
00449         DMSetDrawInterpOptions setDrawInterpOptions,
00450         void *userData)
00451 {
00452     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00453     BMEdge *eed;
00454     BMIter iter;
00455     int i;
00456 
00457     if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
00458 
00459         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERT);
00460 
00461         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00462         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00463         for (i=0; eed; i++,eed=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00464             if (!setDrawOptions || (setDrawOptions(userData, i) != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP)) {
00465                 setDrawInterpOptions(userData, i, 0.0);
00466                 glVertex3fv(bmdm->vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(eed->v1)]);
00467                 setDrawInterpOptions(userData, i, 1.0);
00468                 glVertex3fv(bmdm->vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(eed->v2)]);
00469             }
00470         }
00471         glEnd();
00472     }
00473     else {
00474         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00475         eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00476         for (i=0; eed; i++,eed=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00477             if (!setDrawOptions || (setDrawOptions(userData, i) != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP)) {
00478                 setDrawInterpOptions(userData, i, 0.0);
00479                 glVertex3fv(eed->v1->co);
00480                 setDrawInterpOptions(userData, i, 1.0);
00481                 glVertex3fv(eed->v2->co);
00482             }
00483         }
00484         glEnd();
00485     }
00486 }

00488 static void emDM_drawUVEdges(DerivedMesh *dm)
00489 {
00490     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00491     BMEditMesh *em = bmdm->tc;
00492     BMFace *efa;
00493     BMIter iter;
00494 
00495     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00496     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00497         BMIter liter;
00498         BMLoop *l;
00499         MLoopUV *lastluv = NULL, *firstluv = NULL;
00500 
00501         if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
00502             continue;
00503 
00504         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00505             MLoopUV *luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00506 
00507             if (luv) {
00508                 if (lastluv)
00509                     glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00510                 glVertex2fv(luv->uv);
00511 
00512                 lastluv = luv;
00513                 if (!firstluv)
00514                     firstluv = luv;
00515             }
00516         }
00517 
00518         if (lastluv) {
00519             glVertex2fv(lastluv->uv);
00520             glVertex2fv(firstluv->uv);
00521         }
00522     }
00523     glEnd();
00524 }
00525 
00526 static void emDM__calcFaceCent(BMesh *bm, BMFace *efa, float cent[3], float (*vertexCos)[3])
00527 {
00528     BMIter iter;
00529     BMLoop *l;
00530     int tot = 0;
00531 
00532     zero_v3(cent);
00533 
00534     /*simple (and stupid) median (average) based method :/ */
00535 
00536     if (vertexCos) {
00537         l = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa);
00538         for (; l; l=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00539             add_v3_v3(cent, vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l->v)]);
00540             tot++;
00541         }
00542     }
00543     else {
00544         l = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa);
00545         for (; l; l=BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00546             add_v3_v3(cent, l->v->co);
00547             tot++;
00548         }
00549     }
00550 
00551     if (tot==0) return;
00552     mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f/(float)tot);
00553 }
00554 
00555 static void emDM_foreachMappedFaceCenter(
00556         DerivedMesh *dm,
00557         void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float co[3], const float no[3]),
00558         void *userData)
00559 {
00560     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00561     float (*polyNos)[3] = NULL;
00562     BMFace *efa;
00563     BMIter iter;
00564     float cent[3];
00565     int i;
00566 
00567     /* ensure for face center calculation */
00568     if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
00569         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERT);
00570         polyNos = bmdm->polyNos;
00571 
00572         BLI_assert(polyNos != NULL);
00573     }
00574 
00575     efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
00576     for (i=0; efa; efa=BM_iter_step(&iter), i++) {
00577         emDM__calcFaceCent(bmdm->tc->bm, efa, cent, bmdm->vertexCos);
00578         func(userData, i, cent, polyNos ? polyNos[i] : efa->no);
00579     }
00580 }
00581 
00582 static void emDM_drawMappedFaces(
00583         DerivedMesh *dm,
00584         DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
00585         DMSetMaterial setMaterial,
00586         DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
00587         void *userData,
00588         DMDrawFlag flag)
00589 {
00590     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00591     BMFace *efa;
00592     struct BMLoop *(*looptris)[3]= bmdm->tc->looptris;
00593     const int tottri= bmdm->tc->tottri;
00594     const int lasttri= tottri - 1; /* compare agasint this a lot */
00595     DMDrawOption draw_option;
00596     int i, flush;
00597     const int skip_normals= !glIsEnabled(GL_LIGHTING); /* could be passed as an arg */
00598 
00599     /* GL_ZERO is used to detect if drawing has started or not */
00600     GLenum poly_prev= GL_ZERO;
00601     GLenum shade_prev= GL_ZERO;
00602 
00603     (void)setMaterial; /* UNUSED */
00604 
00605     /* currently unused -- each original face is handled separately */
00606     (void)compareDrawOptions;
00607 
00608     if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
00609         /* add direct access */
00610         float (*vertexCos)[3]= bmdm->vertexCos;
00611         float (*vertexNos)[3]= bmdm->vertexNos;
00612         float (*polyNos)[3]=   bmdm->polyNos;
00613         // int *triPolyMap= bmdm->triPolyMap;
00614 
00615         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERT | BM_FACE);
00616 
00617         for (i=0; i < tottri; i++) {
00618             BMLoop **l = looptris[i];
00619             int drawSmooth;
00620 
00621             efa = l[0]->f;
00622             drawSmooth= (flag & DM_DRAW_ALWAYS_SMOOTH) ? 1 : BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
00623 
00624             draw_option = (!setDrawOptions ?
00625                            DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL :
00626                            setDrawOptions(userData, BM_elem_index_get(efa)));
00627             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
00628                 const GLenum poly_type= GL_TRIANGLES; /* BMESH NOTE, this is odd but keep it for now to match trunk */
00629                 if (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_STIPPLE) { /* enabled with stipple */
00630 
00631                     if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00632                     poly_prev= GL_ZERO; /* force glBegin */
00633 
00634                     glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00635                     glPolygonStipple(stipple_quarttone);
00636                 }
00637 
00638                 if (skip_normals) {
00639                     if (poly_type != poly_prev) {
00640                         if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00641                         glBegin((poly_prev= poly_type)); /* BMesh: will always be GL_TRIANGLES */
00642                     }
00643                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[0]->v)]);
00644                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[1]->v)]);
00645                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[2]->v)]);
00646                 }
00647                 else {
00648                     const GLenum shade_type= drawSmooth ? GL_SMOOTH : GL_FLAT;
00649                     if (shade_type != shade_prev) {
00650                         if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00651                         glShadeModel((shade_prev= shade_type)); /* same as below but switch shading */
00652                         glBegin((poly_prev= poly_type)); /* BMesh: will always be GL_TRIANGLES */
00653                     }
00654                     if (poly_type != poly_prev) {
00655                         if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00656                         glBegin((poly_prev= poly_type)); /* BMesh: will always be GL_TRIANGLES */
00657                     }
00658 
00659                     if (!drawSmooth) {
00660                         glNormal3fv(polyNos[BM_elem_index_get(efa)]);
00661                         glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[0]->v)]);
00662                         glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[1]->v)]);
00663                         glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[2]->v)]);
00664                     }
00665                     else {
00666                         glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(l[0]->v)]);
00667                         glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[0]->v)]);
00668                         glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(l[1]->v)]);
00669                         glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[1]->v)]);
00670                         glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(l[2]->v)]);
00671                         glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l[2]->v)]);
00672                     }
00673                 }
00674 
00675                 flush= (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_STIPPLE);
00676                 if (!skip_normals && !flush && (i != lasttri))
00677                     flush|= efa->mat_nr != looptris[i + 1][0]->f->mat_nr; /* TODO, make this neater */
00678 
00679                 if (flush) {
00680                     glEnd();
00681                     poly_prev= GL_ZERO; /* force glBegin */
00682 
00683                     glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00684                 }
00685             }
00686         }
00687     }
00688     else {
00689         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bmdm->tc->bm, BM_FACE);
00690 
00691         for (i=0; i < tottri; i++) {
00692             BMLoop **l = looptris[i];
00693             int drawSmooth;
00694 
00695             efa = l[0]->f;
00696             drawSmooth= (flag & DM_DRAW_ALWAYS_SMOOTH) ? 1 : BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
00697 
00698             draw_option = (!setDrawOptions ?
00699                            DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL :
00700                            setDrawOptions(userData, BM_elem_index_get(efa)));
00701             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
00702                 const GLenum poly_type= GL_TRIANGLES; /* BMESH NOTE, this is odd but keep it for now to match trunk */
00703                 if (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_STIPPLE) { /* enabled with stipple */
00704 
00705                     if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00706                     poly_prev= GL_ZERO; /* force glBegin */
00707 
00708                     glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00709                     glPolygonStipple(stipple_quarttone);
00710                 }
00711 
00712                 if (skip_normals) {
00713                     if (poly_type != poly_prev) {
00714                         if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00715                         glBegin((poly_prev= poly_type)); /* BMesh: will always be GL_TRIANGLES */
00716                     }
00717                     glVertex3fv(l[0]->v->co);
00718                     glVertex3fv(l[1]->v->co);
00719                     glVertex3fv(l[2]->v->co);
00720                 }
00721                 else {
00722                     const GLenum shade_type= drawSmooth ? GL_SMOOTH : GL_FLAT;
00723                     if (shade_type != shade_prev) {
00724                         if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00725                         glShadeModel((shade_prev= shade_type)); /* same as below but switch shading */
00726                         glBegin((poly_prev= poly_type)); /* BMesh: will always be GL_TRIANGLES */
00727                     }
00728                     if (poly_type != poly_prev) {
00729                         if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00730                         glBegin((poly_prev= poly_type)); /* BMesh: will always be GL_TRIANGLES */
00731                     }
00732 
00733                     if (!drawSmooth) {
00734                         glNormal3fv(efa->no);
00735                         glVertex3fv(l[0]->v->co);
00736                         glVertex3fv(l[1]->v->co);
00737                         glVertex3fv(l[2]->v->co);
00738                     }
00739                     else {
00740                         glNormal3fv(l[0]->v->no);
00741                         glVertex3fv(l[0]->v->co);
00742                         glNormal3fv(l[1]->v->no);
00743                         glVertex3fv(l[1]->v->co);
00744                         glNormal3fv(l[2]->v->no);
00745                         glVertex3fv(l[2]->v->co);
00746                     }
00747                 }
00748 
00749                 flush= (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_STIPPLE);
00750                 if (!skip_normals && !flush && (i != lasttri)) {
00751                     flush|= efa->mat_nr != looptris[i + 1][0]->f->mat_nr; /* TODO, make this neater */
00752                 }
00753 
00754                 if (flush) {
00755                     glEnd();
00756                     poly_prev= GL_ZERO; /* force glBegin */
00757 
00758                     glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00759                 }
00760             }
00761         }
00762     }
00763 
00764     /* if non zero we know a face was rendered */
00765     if (poly_prev != GL_ZERO) glEnd();
00766 }
00767 
00768 static void bmdm_get_tri_tex(BMesh *bm, BMLoop **ls, MLoopUV *luv[3], MLoopCol *lcol[3],
00769                  int has_uv, int has_col)
00770 {
00771     if (has_uv) {
00772         luv[0] = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, ls[0]->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00773         luv[1] = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, ls[1]->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00774         luv[2] = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, ls[2]->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00775     }
00776 
00777     if (has_col) {
00778         lcol[0] = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, ls[0]->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00779         lcol[1] = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, ls[1]->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00780         lcol[2] = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, ls[2]->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00781     }
00782 
00783 
00784 }
00785 
00786 static void emDM_drawFacesTex_common(
00787         DerivedMesh *dm,
00788         DMSetDrawOptionsTex drawParams,
00789         DMSetDrawOptions drawParamsMapped,
00790         DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
00791         void *userData)
00792 {
00793     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00794     BMEditMesh *em = bmdm->tc;
00795     BMesh *bm= bmdm->tc->bm;
00796     float (*vertexCos)[3]= bmdm->vertexCos;
00797     float (*vertexNos)[3]= bmdm->vertexNos;
00798     BMFace *efa;
00799     MLoopUV *luv[3], dummyluv = {{0}};
00800     MLoopCol *lcol[3] = {NULL}, dummylcol = {0};
00801     int i, has_vcol = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00802     int has_uv = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00803 
00804     (void) compareDrawOptions;
00805 
00806     luv[0] = luv[1] = luv[2] = &dummyluv;
00807 
00808     dummylcol.r = dummylcol.g = dummylcol.b = dummylcol.a = 255;
00809 
00810     /* always use smooth shading even for flat faces, else vertex colors wont interpolate */
00811     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00812 
00813     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_FACE);
00814 
00815     if (vertexCos) {
00816         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
00817 
00818         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00819         for (i=0; i<em->tottri; i++) {
00820             BMLoop **ls = em->looptris[i];
00821             MTexPoly *tp= has_uv ? CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, ls[0]->f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY) : NULL;
00822             MTFace mtf = {{{0}}};
00823             /*unsigned char *cp= NULL;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00824             int drawSmooth= BM_elem_flag_test(ls[0]->f, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
00825             DMDrawOption draw_option;
00826 
00827             efa = ls[0]->f;
00828 
00829             if (has_uv) {
00830                 ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(&mtf, tp);
00831             }
00832 
00833             if (drawParams)
00834                 draw_option= drawParams(&mtf, has_vcol, efa->mat_nr);
00835             else if (drawParamsMapped)
00836                 draw_option= drawParamsMapped(userData, BM_elem_index_get(efa));
00837             else
00838                 draw_option= DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL;
00839 
00840             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
00841 
00842                 if (!drawSmooth) {
00843                     glNormal3fv(bmdm->polyNos[BM_elem_index_get(efa)]);
00844 
00845                     bmdm_get_tri_tex(bm, ls, luv, lcol, has_uv, has_vcol);
00846 
00847                     glTexCoord2fv(luv[0]->uv);
00848                     if (lcol[0])
00849                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[0]->r));
00850                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[0]->v)]);
00851 
00852                     glTexCoord2fv(luv[1]->uv);
00853                     if (lcol[1])
00854                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[1]->r));
00855                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[1]->v)]);
00856 
00857                     glTexCoord2fv(luv[2]->uv);
00858                     if (lcol[2])
00859                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[2]->r));
00860                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[2]->v)]);
00861                 }
00862                 else {
00863                     bmdm_get_tri_tex(bm, ls, luv, lcol, has_uv, has_vcol);
00864 
00865                     glTexCoord2fv(luv[0]->uv);
00866                     if (lcol[0])
00867                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[0]->r));
00868                     glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[0]->v)]);
00869                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[0]->v)]);
00870 
00871                     glTexCoord2fv(luv[1]->uv);
00872                     if (lcol[1])
00873                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[1]->r));
00874                     glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[1]->v)]);
00875                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[1]->v)]);
00876 
00877                     glTexCoord2fv(luv[2]->uv);
00878                     if (lcol[2])
00879                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[2]->r));
00880                     glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[2]->v)]);
00881                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ls[2]->v)]);
00882                 }
00883             }
00884         }
00885         glEnd();
00886     }
00887     else {
00888         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
00889 
00890         for (i=0; i<em->tottri; i++) {
00891             BMLoop **ls = em->looptris[i];
00892             MTexPoly *tp= has_uv ? CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, ls[0]->f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY) : NULL;
00893             MTFace mtf = {{{0}}};
00894             /*unsigned char *cp= NULL;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00895             int drawSmooth= BM_elem_flag_test(ls[0]->f, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
00896             DMDrawOption draw_option;
00897 
00898             efa = ls[0]->f;
00899 
00900             if (has_uv) {
00901                 ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(&mtf, tp);
00902             }
00903 
00904             if (drawParams)
00905                 draw_option= drawParams(&mtf, has_vcol, efa->mat_nr);
00906             else if (drawParamsMapped)
00907                 draw_option= drawParamsMapped(userData, BM_elem_index_get(efa));
00908             else
00909                 draw_option= DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL;
00910 
00911             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
00912 
00913                 glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00914                 if (!drawSmooth) {
00915                     glNormal3fv(efa->no);
00916 
00917                     bmdm_get_tri_tex(bm, ls, luv, lcol, has_uv, has_vcol);
00918 
00919                     if (luv[0])
00920                         glTexCoord2fv(luv[0]->uv);
00921                     if (lcol[0])
00922                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[0]->r));
00923                     glVertex3fv(ls[0]->v->co);
00924 
00925                     if (luv[1])
00926                         glTexCoord2fv(luv[1]->uv);
00927                     if (lcol[1])
00928                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[1]->r));
00929                     glVertex3fv(ls[1]->v->co);
00930 
00931                     if (luv[2])
00932                         glTexCoord2fv(luv[2]->uv);
00933                     if (lcol[2])
00934                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[2]->r));
00935                     glVertex3fv(ls[2]->v->co);
00936                 }
00937                 else {
00938                     bmdm_get_tri_tex(bm, ls, luv, lcol, has_uv, has_vcol);
00939 
00940                     if (luv[0])
00941                         glTexCoord2fv(luv[0]->uv);
00942                     if (lcol[0])
00943                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[0]->r));
00944                     glNormal3fv(ls[0]->v->no);
00945                     glVertex3fv(ls[0]->v->co);
00946 
00947                     if (luv[1])
00948                         glTexCoord2fv(luv[1]->uv);
00949                     if (lcol[1])
00950                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[1]->r));
00951                     glNormal3fv(ls[1]->v->no);
00952                     glVertex3fv(ls[1]->v->co);
00953 
00954                     if (luv[2])
00955                         glTexCoord2fv(luv[2]->uv);
00956                     if (lcol[2])
00957                         glColor3ubv((const GLubyte *)&(lcol[2]->r));
00958                     glNormal3fv(ls[2]->v->no);
00959                     glVertex3fv(ls[2]->v->co);
00960                 }
00961                 glEnd();
00962             }
00963         }
00964     }
00965 
00966     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00967 }

00969 static void emDM_drawFacesTex(
00970         DerivedMesh *dm,
00971         DMSetDrawOptionsTex setDrawOptions,
00972         DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
00973         void *userData)
00974 {
00975     emDM_drawFacesTex_common(dm, setDrawOptions, NULL, compareDrawOptions, userData);
00976 }

00979         DerivedMesh *dm,
00980         DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,

00982         void *userData)
00983 {
00984     emDM_drawFacesTex_common(dm, NULL, setDrawOptions, compareDrawOptions, userData);
00985 }
00986 
00987 static void emDM_drawMappedFacesGLSL(
00988         DerivedMesh *dm,
00989         DMSetMaterial setMaterial,
00990         DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
00991         void *userData)
00992 {
00993     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
00994     BMesh *bm= bmdm->tc->bm;
00995     BMEditMesh *em = bmdm->tc;
00996     float (*vertexCos)[3]= bmdm->vertexCos;
00997     float (*vertexNos)[3]= bmdm->vertexNos;
00998     BMFace *efa;
00999     BMLoop **ltri;
01000     DMVertexAttribs attribs;
01001     GPUVertexAttribs gattribs;
01002 
01003     int i, b, matnr, new_matnr, dodraw;
01004 
01005     dodraw = 0;
01006     matnr = -1;
01007 
01008     memset(&attribs, 0, sizeof(attribs));
01009 
01010     /* always use smooth shading even for flat faces, else vertex colors wont interpolate */
01011     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
01012     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT | BM_FACE);
01013 
01014 #define PASSATTRIB(loop, eve, vert) {                                           \
01015     if (attribs.totorco) {                                                      \
01016         float *orco = attribs.orco.array[BM_elem_index_get(eve)];                       \
01017         glVertexAttrib3fvARB(attribs.orco.glIndex, orco);                       \
01018     }                                                                           \
01019     for (b = 0; b < attribs.tottface; b++) {                                    \
01020         MLoopUV *_luv = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->ldata, loop->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV, b);\
01021         glVertexAttrib2fvARB(attribs.tface[b].glIndex, _luv->uv);               \
01022     }                                                                           \
01023     for (b = 0; b < attribs.totmcol; b++) {                                     \
01024         MLoopCol *_cp = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->ldata, loop->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL, b);\
01025         GLubyte _col[4];                                                        \
01026         _col[0]= _cp->b; _col[1]= _cp->g; _col[2]= _cp->r; _col[3]= _cp->a;     \
01027         glVertexAttrib4ubvARB(attribs.mcol[b].glIndex, _col);                   \
01028     }                                                                           \
01029     if (attribs.tottang) {                                                      \
01030         float *tang = attribs.tang.array[i*4 + vert];                           \
01031         glVertexAttrib3fvARB(attribs.tang.glIndex, tang);                       \
01032     }                                                                           \
01033     }
01034 
01035 
01036     for (i=0, ltri=em->looptris[0]; i<em->tottri; i++, ltri += 3) {
01037         int drawSmooth;
01038 
01039         efa = ltri[0]->f;
01040         drawSmooth= BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
01041 
01042         if (setDrawOptions && (setDrawOptions(userData, BM_elem_index_get(efa)) == DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP))
01043             continue;
01044 
01045         new_matnr = efa->mat_nr + 1;
01046         if (new_matnr != matnr) {
01047             dodraw = setMaterial(matnr = new_matnr, &gattribs);
01048             if (dodraw)
01049                 DM_vertex_attributes_from_gpu(dm, &gattribs, &attribs);
01050         }
01051 
01052         if (dodraw) {
01053             glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
01054             if (!drawSmooth) {
01055                 if (vertexCos) glNormal3fv(bmdm->polyNos[BM_elem_index_get(efa)]);
01056                 else glNormal3fv(efa->no);
01057 
01058                 PASSATTRIB(ltri[0], ltri[0]->v, 0);
01059                 if (vertexCos) glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[0]->v)]);
01060                 else glVertex3fv(ltri[0]->v->co);
01061 
01062                 PASSATTRIB(ltri[1], ltri[1]->v, 1);
01063                 if (vertexCos) glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[1]->v)]);
01064                 else glVertex3fv(ltri[1]->v->co);
01065 
01066                 PASSATTRIB(ltri[2], ltri[2]->v, 2);
01067                 if (vertexCos) glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[2]->v)]);
01068                 else glVertex3fv(ltri[2]->v->co);
01069             }
01070             else {
01071                 PASSATTRIB(ltri[0], ltri[0]->v, 0);
01072                 if (vertexCos) {
01073                     glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[0]->v)]);
01074                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[0]->v)]);
01075                 }
01076                 else {
01077                     glNormal3fv(ltri[0]->v->no);
01078                     glVertex3fv(ltri[0]->v->co);
01079                 }
01080 
01081                 PASSATTRIB(ltri[1], ltri[1]->v, 1);
01082                 if (vertexCos) {
01083                     glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[1]->v)]);
01084                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[1]->v)]);
01085                 }
01086                 else {
01087                     glNormal3fv(ltri[1]->v->no);
01088                     glVertex3fv(ltri[1]->v->co);
01089                 }
01090 
01091                 PASSATTRIB(ltri[2], ltri[2]->v, 2);
01092                 if (vertexCos) {
01093                     glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[2]->v)]);
01094                     glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[2]->v)]);
01095                 }
01096                 else {
01097                     glNormal3fv(ltri[2]->v->no);
01098                     glVertex3fv(ltri[2]->v->co);
01099                 }
01100             }
01101             glEnd();
01102         }
01103     }
01104 #undef PASSATTRIB
01105 }
01106 
01107 static void emDM_drawFacesGLSL(
01108         DerivedMesh *dm,
01109         int (*setMaterial)(int, void *attribs))
01110 {
01111     dm->drawMappedFacesGLSL(dm, setMaterial, NULL, NULL);
01112 }
01113 
01114 static void emDM_drawMappedFacesMat(
01115         DerivedMesh *dm,
01116         void (*setMaterial)(void *userData, int, void *attribs),
01117         int (*setFace)(void *userData, int index), void *userData)
01118 {
01119     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
01120     BMesh *bm= bmdm->tc->bm;
01121     BMEditMesh *em = bmdm->tc;
01122     float (*vertexCos)[3]= bmdm->vertexCos;
01123     float (*vertexNos)[3]= bmdm->vertexNos;
01124     BMFace *efa;
01125     BMLoop **ltri;
01126     DMVertexAttribs attribs= {{{0}}};
01127     GPUVertexAttribs gattribs;
01128     int i, b, matnr, new_matnr;
01129 
01130     matnr = -1;
01131 
01132     /* always use smooth shading even for flat faces, else vertex colors wont interpolate */
01133     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
01134 
01135     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT|BM_FACE);
01136 
01137 #define PASSATTRIB(loop, eve, vert) {                                           \
01138     if (attribs.totorco) {                                                      \
01139         float *orco = attribs.orco.array[BM_elem_index_get(eve)];               \
01140         if (attribs.orco.glTexco)                                               \
01141             glTexCoord3fv(orco);                                                \
01142         else                                                                    \
01143             glVertexAttrib3fvARB(attribs.orco.glIndex, orco);                   \
01144     }                                                                           \
01145     for (b = 0; b < attribs.tottface; b++) {                                    \
01146         MLoopUV *_luv = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->ldata, loop->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV, b);\
01147         if (attribs.tface[b].glTexco)                                           \
01148             glTexCoord2fv(_luv->uv);                                            \
01149         else                                                                    \
01150             glVertexAttrib2fvARB(attribs.tface[b].glIndex, _luv->uv);           \
01151     }                                                                           \
01152     for (b = 0; b < attribs.totmcol; b++) {                                     \
01153         MLoopCol *_cp = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->ldata, loop->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL, b);\
01154         GLubyte _col[4];                                                        \
01155         _col[0]= _cp->b; _col[1]= _cp->g; _col[2]= _cp->r; _col[3]= _cp->a;     \
01156         glVertexAttrib4ubvARB(attribs.mcol[b].glIndex, _col);                   \
01157     }                                                                           \
01158     if (attribs.tottang) {                                                      \
01159         float *tang = attribs.tang.array[i*4 + vert];                           \
01160         glVertexAttrib4fvARB(attribs.tang.glIndex, tang);                       \
01161     }                                                                           \
01162 }
01163 
01164     for (i=0, ltri=em->looptris[0]; i<em->tottri; i++, ltri += 3) {
01165         int drawSmooth;
01166 
01167         efa = ltri[0]->f;
01168         drawSmooth = BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
01169 
01170         /* face hiding */
01171         if (setFace && !setFace(userData, BM_elem_index_get(efa)))
01172             continue;
01173 
01174         /* material */
01175         new_matnr = efa->mat_nr + 1;
01176         if (new_matnr != matnr) {
01177             setMaterial(userData, matnr = new_matnr, &gattribs);
01178             DM_vertex_attributes_from_gpu(dm, &gattribs, &attribs);
01179         }
01180 
01181         /* face */
01182         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
01183         if (!drawSmooth) {
01184             if (vertexCos) glNormal3fv(bmdm->polyNos[BM_elem_index_get(efa)]);
01185             else glNormal3fv(efa->no);
01186 
01187             PASSATTRIB(ltri[0], ltri[0]->v, 0);
01188             if (vertexCos) glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[0]->v)]);
01189             else glVertex3fv(ltri[0]->v->co);
01190 
01191             PASSATTRIB(ltri[1], ltri[1]->v, 1);
01192             if (vertexCos) glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[1]->v)]);
01193             else glVertex3fv(ltri[1]->v->co);
01194 
01195             PASSATTRIB(ltri[2], ltri[2]->v, 2);
01196             if (vertexCos) glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[2]->v)]);
01197             else glVertex3fv(ltri[2]->v->co);
01198 
01199         }
01200         else {
01201             PASSATTRIB(ltri[0], ltri[0]->v, 0);
01202             if (vertexCos) {
01203                 glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[0]->v)]);
01204                 glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[0]->v)]);
01205             }
01206             else {
01207                 glNormal3fv(ltri[0]->v->no);
01208                 glVertex3fv(ltri[0]->v->co);
01209             }
01210 
01211             PASSATTRIB(ltri[1], ltri[1]->v, 1);
01212             if (vertexCos) {
01213                 glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[1]->v)]);
01214                 glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[1]->v)]);
01215             }
01216             else {
01217                 glNormal3fv(ltri[1]->v->no);
01218                 glVertex3fv(ltri[1]->v->co);
01219             }
01220 
01221             PASSATTRIB(ltri[2], ltri[2]->v, 2);
01222             if (vertexCos) {
01223                 glNormal3fv(vertexNos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[2]->v)]);
01224                 glVertex3fv(vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(ltri[2]->v)]);
01225             }
01226             else {
01227                 glNormal3fv(ltri[2]->v->no);
01228                 glVertex3fv(ltri[2]->v->co);
01229             }
01230         }
01231         glEnd();
01232     }
01233 #undef PASSATTRIB
01234 }
01235 
01236 static void emDM_getMinMax(DerivedMesh *dm, float min_r[3], float max_r[3])
01237 {
01238     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
01239     BMVert *eve;
01240     BMIter iter;
01241     int i;
01242 
01243     if (bmdm->tc->bm->totvert) {
01244         eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
01245         for (i=0; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter), i++) {
01246             if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
01247                 DO_MINMAX(bmdm->vertexCos[i], min_r, max_r);
01248             }
01249             else {
01250                 DO_MINMAX(eve->co, min_r, max_r);
01251             }
01252         }
01253     }
01254     else {
01255         zero_v3(min_r);
01256         zero_v3(max_r);
01257     }
01258 }
01259 static int emDM_getNumVerts(DerivedMesh *dm)
01260 {
01261     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
01262 
01263     return bmdm->tc->bm->totvert;
01264 }
01265

01268     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
01269 
01270     return bmdm->tc->bm->totedge;
01271 }

01293 
01294 static int bmvert_to_mvert(BMesh *bm, BMVert *ev, MVert *vert_r)
01295 {
01296     copy_v3_v3(vert_r->co, ev->co);
01297 
01298     normal_float_to_short_v3(vert_r->no, ev->no);
01299 
01300     vert_r->flag = BM_vert_flag_to_mflag(ev);
01301 
01302     if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_BWEIGHT)) {
01303         vert_r->bweight = (unsigned char) (BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->vdata, ev, CD_BWEIGHT)*255.0f);
01304     }
01305 
01306     return 1;
01307 }
01308 
01309 static void emDM_getVert(DerivedMesh *dm, int index, MVert *vert_r)
01310 {
01311     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01312     BMVert *ev;
01313 
01314     if (index < 0 || index >= bmdm->tv) {
01315         printf("error in emDM_getVert.\n");
01316         return;
01317     }
01318 
01319     // ev = EDBM_vert_at_index(bmdm->tc, index);
01320     ev = BM_vert_at_index(bmdm->tc->bm, index); /* warning, does list loop, _not_ ideal */
01321 
01322     bmvert_to_mvert(bmdm->tc->bm, ev, vert_r);
01323     if (bmdm->vertexCos)
01324         copy_v3_v3(vert_r->co, bmdm->vertexCos[index]);
01325 }
01326 
01327 static void emDM_getEdge(DerivedMesh *dm, int index, MEdge *edge_r)
01328 {
01329     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01330     BMesh *bm = bmdm->tc->bm;
01331     BMEdge *e;
01332 
01333     if (index < 0 || index >= bmdm->te) {
01334         printf("error in emDM_getEdge.\n");
01335         return;
01336     }
01337 
01338     // e = EDBM_edge_at_index(bmdm->tc, index);
01339     e = BM_edge_at_index(bmdm->tc->bm, index); /* warning, does list loop, _not_ ideal */
01340 
01341     if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_BWEIGHT)) {
01342         edge_r->bweight = (unsigned char) (BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->edata, e, CD_BWEIGHT)*255.0f);
01343     }
01344 
01345     if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_CREASE)) {
01346         edge_r->crease = (unsigned char) (BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->edata, e, CD_CREASE)*255.0f);
01347     }
01348 
01349     edge_r->flag = BM_edge_flag_to_mflag(e);
01350 
01351     edge_r->v1 = BM_elem_index_get(e->v1);
01352     edge_r->v2 = BM_elem_index_get(e->v2);
01353 }
01354 
01355 static void emDM_getTessFace(DerivedMesh *dm, int index, MFace *face_r)
01356 {
01357     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01358     BMFace *ef;
01359     BMLoop **l;
01360 
01361     if (index < 0 || index >= bmdm->tf) {
01362         printf("error in emDM_getTessFace.\n");
01363         return;
01364     }
01365 
01366     l = bmdm->tc->looptris[index];
01367 
01368     ef = l[0]->f;
01369 
01370     face_r->mat_nr = (unsigned char) ef->mat_nr;
01371     face_r->flag = BM_face_flag_to_mflag(ef);
01372 
01373     face_r->v1 = BM_elem_index_get(l[0]->v);
01374     face_r->v2 = BM_elem_index_get(l[1]->v);
01375     face_r->v3 = BM_elem_index_get(l[2]->v);
01376     face_r->v4 = 0;
01377 
01378     test_index_face(face_r, NULL, 0, 3);
01379 }
01380 
01381 static void emDM_copyVertArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MVert *vert_r)
01382 {
01383     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01384     BMesh *bm = bmdm->tc->bm;
01385     BMVert *ev;
01386     BMIter iter;
01387     int i;
01388 
01389     ev = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
01390     for (i = 0 ; ev; ev = BM_iter_step(&iter), ++vert_r, ++i) {
01391         if (bmdm->vertexCos)
01392             copy_v3_v3(vert_r->co, bmdm->vertexCos[i]);
01393         else
01394             copy_v3_v3(vert_r->co, ev->co);
01395 
01396         normal_float_to_short_v3(vert_r->no, ev->no);
01397 
01398         vert_r->flag = BM_vert_flag_to_mflag(ev);
01399 
01400         if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_BWEIGHT)) {
01401             vert_r->bweight = (unsigned char) (BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->vdata, ev, CD_BWEIGHT)*255.0f);
01402         }
01403     }
01404 }
01405 
01406 static void emDM_copyEdgeArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MEdge *edge_r)
01407 {
01408     BMesh *bm = ((EditDerivedBMesh *)dm)->tc->bm;
01409     BMEdge *ee;
01410     BMIter iter;
01411     int has_bweight = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_BWEIGHT);
01412     int has_crease = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_CREASE);
01413 
01414     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
01415 
01416     ee = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01417     for ( ; ee; ee=BM_iter_step(&iter), edge_r++) {
01418         if (has_bweight) {
01419             edge_r->bweight = (unsigned char) (BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->edata, ee, CD_BWEIGHT)*255.0f);
01420         }
01421 
01422         if (has_crease) {
01423             edge_r->crease = (unsigned char) (BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->edata, ee, CD_CREASE)*255.0f);
01424         }
01425 
01426         edge_r->flag = BM_edge_flag_to_mflag(ee);
01427 
01428         edge_r->v1 = BM_elem_index_get(ee->v1);
01429         edge_r->v2 = BM_elem_index_get(ee->v2);
01430     }
01431 }
01432 
01433 static void emDM_copyTessFaceArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MFace *face_r)
01434 {
01435     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01436     BMesh *bm = bmdm->tc->bm;
01437     BMFace *ef;
01438     BMLoop **l;
01439     int i;
01440 
01441     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
01442 
01443     for (i=0; i<bmdm->tc->tottri; i++, face_r++) {
01444         l = bmdm->tc->looptris[i];
01445         ef = l[0]->f;
01446 
01447         face_r->mat_nr = (unsigned char) ef->mat_nr;
01448 
01449         face_r->flag = BM_face_flag_to_mflag(ef);
01450 
01451         face_r->v1 = BM_elem_index_get(l[0]->v);
01452         face_r->v2 = BM_elem_index_get(l[1]->v);
01453         face_r->v3 = BM_elem_index_get(l[2]->v);
01454         face_r->v4 = 0;
01455 
01456         test_index_face(face_r, NULL, 0, 3);
01457     }
01458 }
01459 
01460 
01461 static void emDM_copyLoopArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MLoop *loop_r)
01462 {
01463     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01464     BMesh *bm = bmdm->tc->bm;
01465     BMIter iter, liter;
01466     BMFace *f;
01467     BMLoop *l;
01468 
01469     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT | BM_EDGE);
01470 
01471     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01472         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01473             loop_r->v = BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
01474             loop_r->e = BM_elem_index_get(l->e);
01475             loop_r++;
01476         }
01477     }
01478 }
01479 
01480 static void emDM_copyPolyArray(DerivedMesh *dm, MPoly *poly_r)
01481 {
01482     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01483     BMesh *bm = bmdm->tc->bm;
01484     BMIter iter;
01485     BMFace *f;
01486     int i;
01487 
01488     i = 0;
01489     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01490         poly_r->flag = BM_face_flag_to_mflag(f);
01491         poly_r->loopstart = i;
01492         poly_r->totloop = f->len;
01493         poly_r->mat_nr = f->mat_nr;
01494 
01495         poly_r++;
01496         i += f->len;
01497     }
01498 }
01499 
01500 static void *emDM_getTessFaceDataArray(DerivedMesh *dm, int type)
01501 {
01502     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
01503     BMesh *bm= bmdm->tc->bm;
01504     void *datalayer;
01505 
01506     datalayer = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, type);
01507     if (datalayer)
01508         return datalayer;
01509 
01510     /* layers are store per face for editmesh, we convert to a temporary
01511      * data layer array in the derivedmesh when these are requested */
01512     if (type == CD_MTFACE || type == CD_MCOL) {
01513         const int type_from = (type == CD_MTFACE) ? CD_MTEXPOLY : CD_MLOOPCOL;
01514         int index;
01515         char *data, *bmdata;
01516         index = CustomData_get_layer_index(&bm->pdata, type_from);
01517 
01518         if (index != -1) {
01519             /* offset = bm->pdata.layers[index].offset; */ /* UNUSED */
01520             const int size = CustomData_sizeof(type);
01521             int i, j;
01522 
01523             DM_add_tessface_layer(dm, type, CD_CALLOC, NULL);
01524             index = CustomData_get_layer_index(&dm->faceData, type);
01525             dm->faceData.layers[index].flag |= CD_FLAG_TEMPORARY;
01526 
01527             data = datalayer = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, type);
01528 
01529             if (type == CD_MTFACE) {
01530                 for (i = 0; i < bmdm->tc->tottri; i++, data += size) {
01531                     BMFace *efa = bmdm->tc->looptris[i][0]->f;
01532                     bmdata = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01533                     ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(((MTFace *)data), ((MTexPoly *)bmdata));
01534                     for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
01535                         bmdata = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, bmdm->tc->looptris[i][j]->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01536                         copy_v2_v2(((MTFace *)data)->uv[j], ((MLoopUV *)bmdata)->uv);
01537                     }
01538                 }
01539             }
01540             else {
01541                 for (i = 0; i < bmdm->tc->tottri; i++, data += size) {
01542                     for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
01543                         bmdata = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, bmdm->tc->looptris[i][j]->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
01544                         MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(((MLoopCol *)bmdata), (((MCol *)data) + j));
01545                     }
01546                 }
01547             }
01548         }
01549     }
01550 
01551     return datalayer;
01552 }
01553 
01554 static void emDM_getVertCos(DerivedMesh *dm, float (*cos_r)[3])
01555 {
01556     EditDerivedBMesh *emdm= (EditDerivedBMesh*) dm;
01557     BMVert *eve;
01558     BMIter iter;
01559     int i;
01560 
01561     i= 0;
01562     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, emdm->tc->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01563         if (emdm->vertexCos) {
01564             copy_v3_v3(cos_r[i], emdm->vertexCos[i]);
01565         }
01566         else {
01567             copy_v3_v3(cos_r[i], eve->co);
01568         }
01569 
01570         i++;
01571     }
01572 }
01573 
01574 static void emDM_release(DerivedMesh *dm)
01575 {
01576     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm= (EditDerivedBMesh *)dm;
01577 
01578     if (DM_release(dm)) {
01579         if (bmdm->vertexCos) {
01580             MEM_freeN(bmdm->vertexCos);
01581             MEM_freeN(bmdm->vertexNos);
01582             MEM_freeN(bmdm->polyNos);
01583         }
01584 
01585         MEM_freeN(bmdm);
01586     }
01587 }

01623 
01624 
01625 DerivedMesh *getEditDerivedBMesh(
01626         BMEditMesh *em,
01627         Object *UNUSED(ob),
01628         float (*vertexCos)[3])
01629 {
01630     EditDerivedBMesh *bmdm = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*bmdm), __func__);
01631     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
01632 
01633     bmdm->tc = em;
01634 
01635     DM_init((DerivedMesh*)bmdm, DM_TYPE_EDITBMESH, em->bm->totvert,
01636          em->bm->totedge, em->tottri, em->bm->totloop, em->bm->totface);
01637 
01638     bmdm->dm.getVertCos = emDM_getVertCos;
01639     bmdm->dm.getMinMax = emDM_getMinMax;
01640 
01641     bmdm->dm.getVertDataLayout = bmDm_getVertDataLayout;
01642     bmdm->dm.getEdgeDataLayout = bmDm_getEdgeDataLayout;
01643     bmdm->dm.getTessFaceDataLayout = bmDm_getTessFaceDataLayout;
01644     bmdm->dm.getLoopDataLayout = bmDm_getLoopDataLayout;
01645     bmdm->dm.getPolyDataLayout = bmDm_getPolyDataLayout;
01646 
01647     bmdm->dm.getNumVerts = emDM_getNumVerts;
01648     bmdm->dm.getNumEdges = emDM_getNumEdges;
01649     bmdm->dm.getNumTessFaces = emDM_getNumTessFaces;
01650     bmdm->dm.getNumLoops = emDM_getNumLoops;
01651     bmdm->dm.getNumPolys = emDM_getNumPolys;
01652 
01653     bmdm->dm.getVert = emDM_getVert;
01654     bmdm->dm.getEdge = emDM_getEdge;
01655     bmdm->dm.getTessFace = emDM_getTessFace;
01656     bmdm->dm.copyVertArray = emDM_copyVertArray;
01657     bmdm->dm.copyEdgeArray = emDM_copyEdgeArray;
01658     bmdm->dm.copyTessFaceArray = emDM_copyTessFaceArray;
01659     bmdm->dm.copyLoopArray = emDM_copyLoopArray;
01660     bmdm->dm.copyPolyArray = emDM_copyPolyArray;
01661 
01662     bmdm->dm.getTessFaceDataArray = emDM_getTessFaceDataArray;
01663 
01664     bmdm->dm.calcNormals = emDM_calcNormals;
01665     bmdm->dm.recalcTessellation = emDM_recalcTessellation;
01666 
01667     bmdm->dm.foreachMappedVert = emDM_foreachMappedVert;
01668     bmdm->dm.foreachMappedEdge = emDM_foreachMappedEdge;
01669     bmdm->dm.foreachMappedFaceCenter = emDM_foreachMappedFaceCenter;
01670 
01671     bmdm->dm.drawEdges = emDM_drawEdges;
01672     bmdm->dm.drawMappedEdges = emDM_drawMappedEdges;
01673     bmdm->dm.drawMappedEdgesInterp = emDM_drawMappedEdgesInterp;
01674     bmdm->dm.drawMappedFaces = emDM_drawMappedFaces;
01675     bmdm->dm.drawMappedFacesTex = emDM_drawMappedFacesTex;
01676     bmdm->dm.drawMappedFacesGLSL = emDM_drawMappedFacesGLSL;
01677     bmdm->dm.drawMappedFacesMat = emDM_drawMappedFacesMat;
01678     bmdm->dm.drawFacesTex = emDM_drawFacesTex;
01679     bmdm->dm.drawFacesGLSL = emDM_drawFacesGLSL;
01680     bmdm->dm.drawUVEdges = emDM_drawUVEdges;
01681 
01682     bmdm->dm.release = emDM_release;
01683 
01684     bmdm->vertexCos = vertexCos;
01685 
01686     if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT)) {
01687         BMIter iter;
01688         BMVert *eve;
01689         int i;
01690 
01691         DM_add_vert_layer(&bmdm->dm, CD_MDEFORMVERT, CD_CALLOC, NULL);
01692 
01693         eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bmdm->tc->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
01694         for (i=0; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter), i++)
01695             DM_set_vert_data(&bmdm->dm, i, CD_MDEFORMVERT,
01696                              CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT));
01697     }
01698 
01699     if (vertexCos) {
01700         BMFace *efa;
01701         BMVert *eve;
01702         BMIter fiter;
01703         BMIter viter;
01704         int i;
01705 
01706         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
01707 
01708         bmdm->vertexNos = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*bmdm->vertexNos) * bm->totvert, "bmdm_vno");
01709         bmdm->polyNos = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*bmdm->polyNos)*bm->totface, "bmdm_pno");
01710 
01711         i = 0;
01712         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01713             BM_elem_index_set(efa, i); /* set_inline */
01714             BM_face_normal_update_vcos(bm, efa, bmdm->polyNos[i], (float const (*)[3])vertexCos);
01715             i++;
01716         }
01717         bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_FACE;
01718 
01719         eve=BM_iter_new(&viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
01720         for (i=0; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&viter), i++) {
01721             float *no = bmdm->vertexNos[i];
01722             BM_ITER_ELEM (efa, &fiter, eve, BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
01723                 add_v3_v3(no, bmdm->polyNos[BM_elem_index_get(efa)]);
01724             }
01725 
01726             /* following Mesh convention; we use vertex coordinate itself
01727              * for normal in this case */
01728             if (normalize_v3(no)==0.0) {
01729                 copy_v3_v3(no, vertexCos[i]);
01730                 normalize_v3(no);
01731             }
01732         }
01733     }
01734 
01735     return (DerivedMesh*) bmdm;
01736 }
01737 
01744 BMEditMesh *BMEdit_FromObject(Object *ob)
01745 {
01746     BLI_assert(ob->type == OB_MESH);
01747     return ((Mesh *)ob->data)->edit_btmesh;
01748 }
